NP we all here to support each during our pregnancy

Mine did the exact same thing!!!!! My bp is always normal, and last wk it was 135/89 and I panic. Cause i didn't know what to do but thank god whn I went back a wk later everything was back normal. Stay not to stress about it cause its just gonna make your bp go up, but I will pray everything is fine for u and your baby

Here is my experience with the low fluid... I had an app for the following weeks and 2 days later I made them see me because I wasn't getting any movements from baby even after doing all the right things, eating, drinking, being perfectly still... When I went in my fluid was way low and was induced that day. The reason I'm telling you this is so you know to keep track of your movements. They never told me what to really look for (one reason I'm going an hour out of town for my doc this time). I pray all is well. Blessings!

My prayers to you evryting is going to be fine.....i had preclsia with my first baby it just happend after deliver....with my second one evryting went fine.....and this is my 3rd pregnancy ism just hoping i dont go thru that again it was scary..... but i hope you relax and dont even worry about it ....

My prayers to you evryting is going to be fine.....i had preclsia with my first baby it just happend after deliver....with my second one evryting went fine.....and this is my 3rd pregnancy ism just hoping i dont go thru that again it was scary..... but i hope you relax and dont even worry about it ....
Thank you all of you. I'm ttying not to stress about it or in general and just drink more water. Thank you all again for the prayers. (':

question: So Im 37 weeks 1 day and had an appointment today. My blood pressure wasn't considered high on scale or anything, but it was a little high for ME. Im usually around 115 over something and I was 132 over 90 today. Also, they found a protein thing in my urine which can be a sign of preeclampsia. AND my amniotic fluid is not considered low on the scale but did decrease a bit. I have another appointment in a week and am getting an ultrasound. Please pray though that its not preeclampsia (toximia)..
title: maybe some prayers?
